piechart.name: pie
piechart.description:
The pie-chart shows the categories of a single sample as slices.

You can choose to enable / disable log scaling and select the sample label by metadata field.

Click a category to drill down to the next level. The layout tab has options to adjust the general layout of the pie-chart.

adjust graph data.name: metadatum
adjust graph data.description: metadatum to name the datasets by
adjust graph data.title: metadatum

name: Species level breakdown of a genus using protein hits
description:
Identify the sequences in a metagenome for a genus into different species.
  • Use the input box below to select a different phylum.
  • Use the e-value cutoff to asses the quality of the hits.
shortdescription: Break down a genus into species.
author: MG-RAST
